Description.Text: Taxim Suite Hotel is an all suite hotel located at the city center of Istanbul at Taksim district walking distance to the famous Taksim Square and Istiklal Street. Taxim Suite has 20 suites all combining of an one bedroom and one sitting room with separate kitchen area. Rooms are equipped with all needs like DVD player,music system and kitchen accessories where you can have the comfort of an private apartment in a full hotel service privileges. In the hotel they have the Faros Restaurant which serves exceptional choices from Turkisih and Italian kitchen open all day 07.00 am to 02.00 am. Amenities - Dry cleaning, Lobby, Reception and Secretarial services.

Taxim Suites Hotel located in the new city center of Istanbul at Taksim steps away to famous Taksim Square and Istiklal Street. All puplic transportation lines like subway,buses,finikular line are only a minute away by foot. You can walk famous bosphorus and Dolmabahce Palace from Taxim Suite Hotel in 10 minutes. Famous Osmanbey and Nisantasi shopping streets are walking distance too to the hotel. Taxim Suites Hotel is located at the center of the congress valley of the city.

Park suite - Park suite offers one king bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, CD player, ceiling fan, color TV, crockery / cutlery, DVD player, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, full kitchen, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, radio, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, stove / oven, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, toaster, valet service, video player and washing machine. Each Park Suite is 44m2 Comprising 1 Bedroom, 1 Lounge, Open plan Kitchen, Bathroom/WC, Shower, The bathrooms are stylish and functional mostly comprising a jacuzzi bathtub for your complete personal relaxation. Park Suites are comfortable, with large windows allowing a fine and uninterrupted view of cityscape. An elegantly contemporary design with modern elements creates a relaxing ambiance for our guest
